item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 8, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Feds Link $150M Cyberheist to 2022 LastPass Hacks (263 points | 131 comments)
2. Postgres Just Cracked the Top Fastest Databases for Analytics (155 points | 26 comments)
3. An epic treatise on error models for systems programming languages (48 points | 1 comment)

7. A game of learning your homelab into a cyberpunk mystery adventure (53 points | 10 comments)

9. Polars Cloud: The Distributed Cloud Architecture to Run Polars Anywhere (204 points | 68 comments)
10. Demodesk (YC W19) Is Hiring a Ruby on Rails Full-Stack Engineer ( | hide)

19. Choosing death penalty by firing squad because it's safer (11 points | 11 comments)
20. How did places like Bell Labs know how to ask the right questions? (2023) (101 points | 69 comments)
21. Age Verification Laws: A Backdoor to Surveillance (439 points | 299 comments)
22. 'Next-Level' Chaos Traces the True Limit of Predictability (46 points | 12 comments)
23. Strobelight: A profiling service built on open source technology (147 points | 45 comments)
24. Athena spacecraft declared dead after toppling over on moon (209 points | 271 comments)
25. Portable MRI Scans Patients for Signs of Stroke (39 points | 15 comments)
26. Integrated sensing and communication based on space-time-coding metasurfaces (30 points | 4 comments)
27. GeoCities in 1995: Building a Home Page on the Internet (131 points | 64 comments)
28. Microsoft is plotting a future without OpenAI (376 points | 370 comments)
29. Show HN: I Built a Telegraph Simulator (62 points | 21 comments)
